{"step_by_step_thinking": "Squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck is a type of cancer that can be caused by several factors. Epstein-Barr Virus (EBV) is known to cause nasopharyngeal carcinoma, a type of head and neck cancer. Human Papillomavirus (HPV) is also a well-established cause of oropharyngeal squamous cell carcinoma. Betel nut chewing is a common habit in some parts of the world and is associated with an increased risk of oral and oropharyngeal squamous cell carcinoma. However, Vitamin A is not a cause of squamous cell carcinoma. In fact, it is often used in cancer prevention and treatment.", "answer_choice": "D. Vitamin A"}
